DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find whether woman gestational diabetes make healthy lifestyle choice , achieve weight goal , complete postpartum care assessment receive two online class healthy nutrition exercise class 6 week - 3 month 9 month postpartum .
DOC.brief_title: Barriers Adherence Recommended Follow-up Women With History Gestational Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Gestational Diabetes Age 21 45 year Preconception BMI 1940 Seen least 2 visit Diabetes Pregnancy Program pregnancy Singleton pregnancy Preexisting diabetes diabetes diagnose 6 week 75 gram 2 hour OGTT BMI > 40 Multiple gestation ( i.e. , twin , triplet , etc . )
